page.title: 18TRAFFIC COUNT A1100,B1067
page.content: We talleyed the cars,lorries,vans, motocycles and bicycles in spring 1985. When we counted them all up the total number of vehicles came to 193. We went at 11:15 until 11:30.There were 90 vehicles going north bound and 103 going south bound.We thought 1 vehicle went by every 4 seconds. TRAFFIC COUNT B1067 We did the traffic count outside the village hall in Somersham.We counted 75 vehicles altogeter.There were 41 West Bound and 34 East Bound.We counted from 10:00am to 10:30am. HOW SOMERSHAM CHILDREN GET TO SCHOOL We asked how 77 Somersham children how they get to school.31 walked,10 cycled 23 went by car and 28 went by bus. VEHICLE OWNERSHIP We surveyed 55 houses.Here are the vehicles they owned.60 cars,13 vans,78 bicyles, 16 motor cycles and 8 mopeds.
